resp = client.search(
    aggs={
        "genres": {
            "terms": {
                "field": "genre",
                "order": {
                    "max_play_count": "desc"
                }
            },
            "aggs": {
                "max_play_count": {
                    "max": {
                        "field": "play_count"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
